English: League of Nations Memeber (Founding Memeber)

Following the end of the last Great War, our nation became a founding memeber of the League of Nations. As such, we enjoy increased prestige, enhanced diplomatic opportunities, and improved international relations.
League of Nations Memeber (Founding Memeber)
We have acceded to the League of Nations. it offers us enhanced diplomatic opportunities, and improved international relations.
Head of the British Commonwealth of Nations
Our position as head of the commonwealth bolsters our global influence. The role also implies certain responsibilities and expectations in terms of diplomacy and defense commitments.
Memeber of the British Commonwealth of Nations
This nation is a member of the British Commonwealth of Nations, a political association of memebers of the British Empire.
Member of the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere (Defacto Leader)

This Nation is a member of the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere. This country has found its self to be the defacto leader and dominates the group.  The organisation is nationalist in nature and will fight European colonial dominance in the East.
Member of the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere
This Nation is a member of the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere. The organisation is nationalist in nature and will fight European colonial dominance in the East.
Signatory of the Anti-Comintern Pact
We are signatories to the Anti-Comintern Pact. We will take all actions to oppose the spread of communism around the world.
Memeber of the Fascist International Congress
We have joined the Fascist International Congress. The world must revolve around the strength of nations such as ourselves.
Memebr of the Communist International
We have joined the Communist International. We shall help liberate the enslaved masses of the capitalist world and foster socialist utopia amoungst our comrade nations.
Member of the League of Nations
This Nation is a member of the League of Nations. We may want to take this into account diplomaticaly.
Member of the British Commonwealth of Nations
This Nation is a member of the British Commonwealth of Nations. These countries can be expected to coordinate their economies and diplomacy.
Member of the Zollervein Customs Union
This Nation is a member of the Zollervein Customs Union. These countries can be expected to coordinate their economic policy.
Member of the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere
This country member of the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere. The organisation is nationalist in nature and will fight European colonial dominance in the East.
Signatory of the Anti-Comintern Pact
As a signatory to the Anti-Comintern Pact this nation will coordinate with fellow signatories to undermine foreign ideologies. They will also coordinate military and state security.
Memeber of the Fascist International Congress
By joining the Fascist International Congress this country will prioritise its own nationalist values and those of its allies (or at least while it is convenient).
Memeber of the Latin Monetary Union
As a member of the Latin Monetary Union this country coordinates currency and economic matters with other member states.
Memebr of the Communist International
This country will work will other communist states to promote communism globaly and protect internal security and foreign interests of the block.
British Empire Games
The city is currently hosting the British Empire (Later Commonwealth) Games. A boom to local business.
The Imperial Conference of $YEAR$

The world is not what it was. At the recent Imperial Conference in London a proposal has been suggested. The Balfour Declaration would declare the United Kingdom and the Dominions to be autonomous Communities within the British Empire, equal in status, in no way subordinate one to another in any aspect of their domestic or external affairs, though united by a common allegiance to the Crown, and freely associated as members of the British Commonwealth of Nations. Perhaps it is time to re-examine our relationships with our Empire?
If you love it you should let it go.
Not in my Dominions!
The $YEAR$ Emergency London Conference

The world is not what it was. Our recent loss in the Great War has shattered the British Empire. Some of our former subjects have come to us with a suggestion. By creating a Commonwealth of British States we can at least salvage some of our global influence.
We should do what we can.
Empire was a mistake.
Our Place in the Empire
London has suggested we take part in the Balfour Declaration. By doing this we would be joining the British Commonwealth of States, to help foster relations and development within the empire!
We take our place in the empire.
We go it alone.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Joins the British Commonwealth
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has acceded to the British Commonwealth of Nations!
Good for them.
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Rejects the Commonwealth
$FROMCOUNTRY$ does not recognise the value of the Commonwealth!
We can go without them.
MONARCHYPLACEHOLDER (Commonwealth in Canada Event)
MONARCHYPLACEHOLDER!
MONARCHYPLACEHOLDER.
MONARCHYPLACEHOLDER.
1st British Empire Games
Commonwealth diplomats have suggested Hamilton for the first British Empire Games. This would be a boom to local business and improve our Commonwealth reputation!
A great opportunity to showcase Canada.
We have not the funds or time for this.
1st British Empire Games
Canada is hosting the first Empire Games in Hamilton. Should we fund a team?
Yes!
We have not the funds or time for this.
1st British Empire Games
Commonwealth diplomats have suggested $CAPITAL$ for the first British Empire Games. This would be a boom to local business and improve our Commonwealth reputation!
A great opportunity to showcase $CAPITAL$.
We have not the funds or time for this.
1st British Empire Games in $FROMCOUNTRY$
$FROMCOUNTRY$ is hosting the first Empire Games in their Capital. Should we fund a team?
Yes!
We have not the funds or time for this.
2nd British Empire Games
Commonwealth diplomats have suggested London for the second British Empire Games. This would be a boom to local business and improve our Commonwealth reputation!
A great opportunity to showcase London.
We have not the funds or time for this.
2nd British Empire Games
The United Kingdom is hosting the first Empire Games in London. Should we fund a team?
Yes!
We have not the funds or time for this.
2nd British Empire Games
Commonwealth diplomats have suggested $CAPITAL$ for the second British Empire Games. This would be a boom to local business and improve our Commonwealth reputation!
A great opportunity to showcase $CAPITAL$.
We have not the funds or time for this.
2nd British Empire Games in $FROMCOUNTRY$
$FROMCOUNTRY$ is hosting the second Empire Games in their Capital. Should we fund a team?
Yes!

Found the League of Nations
Our recent way has been a war to end all wars. We have the opportunity to create an organisation eo ensure peace in our time.
This is the right thing to do
We can ensure our own security
Found the League of Nations
Following the recent Great War, the victorious powers have created a organisation to foster international relations. Is this in our interest?.
Peace in our time!
Not worth it.
Ejected from the Commonwealth
Due to our political developments we have been ejected from the Commonwealth.
Do we need em!
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Applies for Commonwealth
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has asked to join the Commonwealth, should we allow them into the organisation?
A Welcome Addition!
They are not the right sort.
Accepted to the Commonwealth
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has welcomed our request to join the Commonwealth, we can welcome our future development together!
Simply Smashing!
Rejected by Commonwealth
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has  not welcomed our request to join the Commonwealth, we are not considered close enough.
Damn.
Special Session
The League of Nations have convened a special setion on our position within the Legaue. Unless a sufficent number of nations consider us worthwhile, we may be ejected from the League!
We did nothing wrong.
Special Session on $FROMCOUNTRY$

The League of Nations have convened a special setion on $FROMCOUNTRY$ and their position within the Legaue. Given their recent behavior, they may not longer be worthy such a seat on international affairs!
Everyone makes mistakes.
They had it coming.
Special Session on $FROMCOUNTRY$
The vote failed! We remain within the League of Nations.
We knew it was fine.
Special Session on $FROMCOUNTRY$
The vote passed! We have been betrayed by the international community.
Oof.
Ascend To The British Commonwealth of Nations
As a nation touched by British culture we may be considered a reasonable candidate for the British Commonwealth of Nations. This will give us more diplomatic opportunities and bonuses.
Ascend To The British Commonwealth of Nations
As a nation touched by British culture we may be considered a reasonable candidate for the British Commonwealth of Nations. This will give us more diplomatic opportunities and bonuses.
Withdraw from The British Commonwealth of Nations
If the Commonwealth no longer serves out interest, perhaps we have the option to withdraw.
